channel.title: [PI] soul split 1/5 hp i got code idk were to add

item.title: [PI] soul split 1/5 hp i got code idk were to add
item.dc:creator: @noobcoderh2o noobcoderh2o
item.description:
@noobcoderh2o wrote:

if (opp.usingPrayer(24) && poison == 0) { //Soul Split if (skillLvl[3] + (int)Math.round(damage * 0.25) > 0) { int toHitpoints = (int)Math.round(damage / 4); if(opp.skillLvl[3] + toHitpoints > opp.getLevelForXP(3)) { toHitpoints = opp.getLevelForXP(3) - opp.skillLvl[3]; } opp.skillLvl[3] += toHitpoints; opp.getActionSender().setSkillLvl(this, 3); } else { opp.skillLvl[3] = 0; opp.getActionSender().setSkillLvl(this, 3); } }

were do i add

also if i want it to give 1/5 hp do i change the 4 to a 5?
also i heard this can give u over 99 hp.

I did not make this code i got it off google somewhere

pi source
